content: You can select the section, room or folder you want to display

comment.text: This translation key is used for the description of a button or label that explains the purpose of selecting a room or folder in a file selection UI. It appears as a tooltip or tooltip content and provides contextual information to help users understand their options.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Baxmaq istədiyiniz bölmə, otaq və ya qovluğu seçə bilərsiniz' is a literal translation and doesn't flow naturally in Azerbaijani. A more natural phrasing would be 'Seçmək istədiyiniz bölmə, otaq və ya qovluğu seçə bilərsiniz' or 'Nə göstərmək istəyirsinizsə, bölmə, otaq və ya qovluğu seçə bilərsiniz'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Seçmək istədiyiniz bölmə, otaq və ya qovluğu seçə bilərsiniz

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'която искате да се показва' is a bit wordy and less natural. It translates literally to 'that you want to be displayed'. A more natural phrasing would be 'която да покажете'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Можете да изберете секцията, стаята или папката, която да покажете

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'anzeigen möchten' (want to display) is a bit awkward. It's more natural to use 'sehen möchten' (would like to see) or simply 'auswählen' (to select) if the context is just selecting something for display.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sie können den Bereich, den Raum oder den Ordner auswählen, den Sie sehen möchten

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "You can select the section, room or folder you want to display" is more accurately conveyed as something like 'You can choose the section, room, or folder to display'. The current translation '디스플레이할 섹션, 방 또는 폴더를 선택할 수 있습니다' is technically correct but a bit stiff and formal. '선택할 수 있습니다' is overly formal for this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 디스플레이할 섹션, 방, 또는 폴더를 선택하세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The comma usage in the Korean translation could be improved for better readability. Adding a space after each comma would make it flow more naturally.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 디스플레이할 섹션, 방, 또는 폴더를 선택할 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "który będzie się wyświetlać" is a bit awkward in Polish. A more natural phrasing would convey the intent more clearly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Możesz wybrać sekcję, pokój lub katalog do wyświetlenia.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "que que pretende visualizar" is redundant. "que pretende visualizar" is sufficient.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pode selecionar a secção, sala, ou pasta que pretende visualizar.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ඔබට පෙන්වීමට වුවමනා කොටස, කාමරය හෝ බහාලුම තේරීමට හැකිය' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness. 'පෙන්වීමට' (to show) is unnecessary here. A better phrasing would focus on selecting.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ඔබට අවශ්‍ය කොටස, කාමරය හෝ බහාලුම තේරීමට හැකිය.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the comma usage might benefit from closer review in context. Consider if a different punctuation is preferable for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Potentially review punctuation in context. May consider alternatives like a dash or no punctuation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "які треба показати" is a bit clunky and could be improved for flow. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning more smoothly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Можна вибрати розділ, кімнату або папку, які потрібно відобразити
